#  Rinnova Spa Body Treatments Don't forget to take care of your body.

A body treatment is like a whole-body facial and the perfect way to take care
of the skin you are in. Our body treatments provide an all over exfoliation
and intense hydration to revitalize the skin. A body treatment that
incorporates a wrap infuses the skin with essential vitamins, minerals and
vital nutrients to nourish the skin. A body treatment is an incredibly
relaxing treatment. Add on CBD oil to any treatment to enhance relaxation and
to help alleviate stress $15 add on.

### Hydrating Body Treatment / 60 min. $160

* * *

This full body skin treatment includes dry brushing the entire body to promote
circulation and exfoliation. A hydrating body mask is applied, and you will be
cocooned in a thermal wrap which infuses and nourishes the skin with essential
vitamins, minerals and vital nutrients. Your skin will be soft to the touch
and glowing!

### Detoxifying Body Treatment / 75 min. $200

* * *

This full body skin treatment begins with 15 minutes in our dry sauna to
promote detoxifying the skin. To start you will enjoy dry body brushing to
stimulate circulation and assist in the elimination of toxins. A full body
seaweed mask is then applied to detoxify and hydrate the skin. You will be
encapsulated in a heated wrap to enhance the detoxifying experience. Finish
with a soothing scalp massage.

### Fascia therapy and lymphatic drainage Body Treatment / 90 min. $250

* * *

This full body skin treatment begins with 15 minutes in our dry sauna to
promote detoxifying the skin. This body contouring treatment starts with dry
body brushing to stimulate circulation and assist in the elimination of
toxins. An application of our body firming and contouring creme is applied to
tighten and tone loose skin; eliminating the “orange peel” look associated
with cellulite. Your skin will be left smooth, toned and hydrated. This is a
relaxing and invigorating body toning treatment to fight skin laxity on a
cellular level. This service stimulates collagen production and reduces the
volume of lipid cells for a smooth, more sculpted body.
